data.name: Shooty Skies Overdrive
data.description:
Escape the arcade in Shooty Skies Overdrive, an action-packed VR shoot ‘em up designed for Oculus Quest. Dodge and weave your way through dynamically generated enemy waves and blast them at point-blank range. An incredible journey through colorful retro worlds and ridiculous alien invaders. 

● A room-scale BULLET HELL shooter experience, inspired by 1980s arcade RETRO classics.
● With your spare hand, snatch a POWER-UP out of the air to get the jump on your enemies. A CHAINSAW? A YO-YO? Is that a SHARK ON A FREAKIN’ STICK?
● Want to just chill in your armchair? That’s OK! Switch to CHILL difficulty and take it easy, couch potato.
● Want an extra challenge? Just switch the game difficulty to OVERDRIVE! (Nice knowing you BTW)
● But you’re not done yet... Go back and fly challenging side missions to unlock an entire SQUADRON of diverse pilots.
● Shooty Skies Overdrive is cross-buy enabled for Oculus Rift and Oculus Quest.

changelog.change_log:
* Updated the game to run at 90hz by default.
* Added a Graphics tab to the options menu for the Quest 2 that allows the user to toggle between:
- High Refresh Rate which runs the game at 90hz with enhanced Resolution (1.2x render scale)
- PostFX which adds Bloom and FXAA to enhance the graphics quality with emissive lighting and runs at 72hz
- Low Battery mode which runs the game at 72hz with no PostFX
* Both Quest 1 and 2 versions of the game have been colour graded to enhance the visual quality of our environments
* Additional graphics optimizations.
* Assorted bug fixes.

FEATURES:
- Added ability to toggle on/off the aiming laser during gameplay in the options menu.
- Added ability to toggle on/off the autofire feature in the options menu.
- Updated hand switching functionality to support more streamlined hand switching using triggers in the game hub.

VISUALS:
- Mesh polish pass on selected pilots and enemies
- Polish pass of visual effects to improve look and performance.
- New VFX added across the game.
- Lighting improvements to all worlds.
- Big improvements to the quality of boss cinematics, animations, visual effects and audio.
- Polished pilot and world unlocking sequence to improve animations and visual effects.

AUDIO:
- New sounds added across the game for UI, world sounds, enemies, pilots and player actions.
- Rebalanced music tracks.

BUGFIXES:
- Improved mission indicator offsets on some enemies.
- Balanced enemy collision volumes to better match meshes.
- Fixed incorrectly coloured voxels and lighting on some enemies.
- Fixed fog quality in Uncandy Valley.
- Fixed sound listener balance in final world.
